German Wikipedia has an article on:
Quadratmeter
Wikipedia de

German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

Compound of Quadrat "square" + Meter "metre".

Pronunciation[edit]

  • Audio (Austria)
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Quadratmeter m or n (genitive Quadratmeters, plural Quadratmeter)

  1. square metre
